name: D.O.G
description:
Welcome to French Bulldog's first game.

We're junior developers and designers who get together to make their dreams come true.

We present you: D.O.G

This is a RPG with a classic  turn-based combat taking rock, paper and scissors as a base. In this game we featured 5 different enemies with his own attack and defense patterns. You have to check the beautiful animations!

This game was submitted to Ready Player 42, a hackathon created by 42 Entrepreneurs. The theme was Addictive Game, we consider this game be addictive by the fact you have to discover the patterns and if you failed you have to play over again. But you are always rewarded with some plot texts. 

Plot: 30XX century: A interplanetary pandemic annihilated the 90% of the human race, our pilot find himself in a problem and he'll fight to survive. Defeat all enemies and find out the ending of this space history. We challenge you to finish the game!

The team:

Escalante, Alejandro - Character Designer.

Escalante, Mariela - Illustrations and Marketing.

Llamosas, Carlos - Animator and Writer.

Pernía, Mario - Lead Designer.

Remesar, Beñat - Programmer.
